subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4861 is on the way
description_text:
Checking my tracking number.... my shipping got abandoned and voided? I can't express feeling anymore...other then let me know what's the next update .

conversations.body_text: Can you provide me with any information regarding my last order? The shipment was voided. I'm curious if you're still on your holiday break.
Hi Jay Trias,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047219031671
